backend/main.mo: Defines session, participant, and message types and provides logic for creating and joining chat sessions with random codes and limits.
backend/migration.mo: Contains data model definitions and a no-op migration function that returns the existing actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides human-written summaries for major frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the root React application and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that restores or initializes session state and switches between LandingPage and ChatPage within the theme provider.
frontend/src/components/actions/CopyCode: Button that copies a session code to the clipboard with fallback behavior and temporary success indicator.
frontend/src/components/chat/AttachmentC: Manages composing messages with file attachments or voice recordings, including previews, size checks, and send actions.
frontend/src/components/chat/Participant: Displays participants with online state, typing indicators, and highlights the current user.
Simple animated three-dot typing indicator component.
frontend/src/components/feedback/InlineE: Styled inline error component showing an alert icon and message.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Dropdown button for switching between light, dark, and system themes using useThemeMode.
frontend/src/context/ThemeModeContext.ts: Provides theme mode and effective theme via context, syncing with storage and system settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity, login, clear, and status via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionPolling.ts: Polls session data and provides a sendMessage utility with attachment handling and immediate refetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useThemeMode.ts: Retrieves theme mode context and throws if used outside ThemeModeProvider.
frontend/src/hooks/useTypingSignal.ts: Sends throttled typing indicators through the backend actor and manages typing timeout.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceRecorder.ts: Implements voice recording with MediaRecorder, tracking duration, errors, and recorded audio blobs.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom light/dark theme CSS variables and global utilities.
frontend/src/lib/attachments.ts: Helpers for file-to-Uint8 conversion, type checks, blob URL creation, and file size formatting.
frontend/src/lib/backendErrorMessages.ts: Maps backend error enums to user-friendly English error messages.
frontend/src/lib/linkify.tsx: Converts URLs in text into clickable links rendered as React nodes.
frontend/src/lib/replicaReject.ts: Detects replica rejection errors and returns user-friendly messages with optional request ID.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Manages session and participant IDs in sessionStorage, providing create, retrieve, and clear helpers with error fallback.
frontend/src/lib/themeMode.ts: Stores and resolves theme mode preferences and listens for system theme changes using localStorage and matchMedia.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Formats bigint nanosecond timestamps into human-readable time or date-time strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point mounting the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Implements the chat UI with message sending, attachments, join notifications, auto-scroll, and session polling.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Handles create/join session flows with input validation, backend calls, error handling, and session persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current state, features, issues, and rebuild context for the ZELLO chat app.
